issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
While testing TableViewRow I was able to check and uncheck box by tapping white area outside this box above "Create TableView" button. Tapping below "Create TableView" button doesn't change value.

Otherwise the result as expected.

Not a regression, the behavior exists on 2.0.1 as well. 

Test steps
1. Run app. 
2. Navigate to acceptance tab and press timob_4648 
3. Press the check box (it should start out checked, so uncheck it) 
4. Press the Create TableView button 
5. Press the check box 
6. Press the Create TableView button
Expected result
After step 4: Evil row should be yellow and With opacity row should be yellow with 0.8 opacity 
After step 6: Should be same as step 4 above
fields.summary: Android: TI.UI.TableViewRow  - v8:  ability to change value of the checkbox by tapping  outside this box
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.2.201205292259
Titanium SDK: 2.0.3.v20120531121740
Device: Nexus One 2.2.2

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
